title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 60-3.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 60-3.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to establish the minimum policy provisions and other requirements with respect to any policy issued in satisfaction of the financial responsibility requirements of Vehicle and Traffic Law article 44-B and a group policy issued pursuant to Insurance Law section 3455. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
60-3.0

Adopted

New

York State Register October 25, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 43, eff. 10/25/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
